definition.de: Die Wahl eines Individuums, der die eigenen Interessen in der Regierung vertreten soll
definition.dk: At vælge den person eller det parti, som vælgeren ønsker, skal repræsentere sine interesser.
definition.en-GB: The act of selecting an individual you would like to represent your interests in government
definition.en-US: The act of selecting an individual you would like to represent your interests in government
definition.pt-BR: Ato de selecionar uma pessoa para representar os seus interesses no governo.
definition.pt-PT: Ato de selecionar uma pessoa para representar os seus interesses no governo.
definition.se: Att välja den individ eller det parti som den röstande vill ska representera dennes intressen.
definition.zh-Hans: 选择一个你愿意在政府中代表你利益的人的行为
